metadataAttributes.Title: Practical Data Science on the AWS Cloud Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Become a cloud data science expert. Develop and scale your data science projects into the cloud using Amazon SageMaker
metadataAttributes.Skills: Natural Language Processing with BERT, ML Pipelines and ML Operations (MLOps), A/B Testing and Model Deployment, Data Labeling at Scale, Automated Machine Learning (AutoML), Statistical Data Bias Detection, Multi-class Classification with FastText and BlazingText, Data ingestion, Exploratory Data Analysis, ML Pipelines and MLOps, Model Training and Deployment with BERT, Model Debugging and Evaluation,
